title: The project continues to grow and improve in order to offer more useful marketing features to customers of Adoric.
leftBlock: In the near future, weâ€™re going to build personalized product recommendations feature that utilizes the power of AI to deliver highly targeted and relevant product suggestions to users.

By analyzing user behavior, purchase history, and preferences, Adoric's AI algorithms will identify patterns and make intelligent predictions about the products that a user is most likely to be interested in.
